participant_1.background:
I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
I made sure to take my dog on a walk every day while I was on vacation.
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better.
i like to train dogs.

participant_2.background:
I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks.
I have the best dogs in the world and I would brag about them to my friends if I was famous.
I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes.
my brother works at best buy.
i live in colorado.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Not bad. I'm a bit in a funk because my house was robbed, but I've been creating new recipes to cheer me up.
Oh no, that's terrible! I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you're able to recover from it.
Thank you. I'm doing my best.
What kind of new recipes have you been making?
I've been making a lot of dog treats, actually. My dogs love them and they're a great way to de-stress.
That's so sweet! I'm sure your dogs love them. I wish I had a dog.
You should get one! They're the best companions.
I know, I've been thinking about it. I just need to find a good breeder.
There are a lot of great breeders in Colorado. I'm sure you'll be able to find one that's a good fit for you.
Thanks for the advice! I'm going to start looking into it
